titles.title: FORCE Act
FORCE Act
Foreign Overseas Residence Conditions Enhancement Act
To require the Secretary of Defense to submit a report on the quality of overseas covered military unaccompanied housing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Foreign Overseas Residence Conditions Enhancement Act or the FORCE Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on the quality of all military unaccompanied housing not located in the United States (i.e., government-owned military housing that is intended to be occupied by members of the Armed Forces serving a tour of duty unaccompanied by dependents).
